info.description: With more than 130 pieces, this extensive range is a stylish collection of high-quality, contemporary furniture with long-term availability. The Signature collection offers whole suites of furniture as comprehensive solutions for every room in the house. Matching Signature is easy, but the pieces in this collection prove to be great mixers, too, as they look super smart with other contemporary ranges. Opt for a rich walnut-stained American oak timber veneer or a high-gloss white lacquer finish, depending on the directional look you are trying to achieve.
info.name: Signature Dresser 8 Drawer (PI)
